channel.title: 317 - N0tpk ECO-Pking,minigames,Bosses, skilling, New Server Looking Moderators
channel.description:
N0tpk:
We are a PKing, Skilling and Pvming server with a 100% GUARANTEED up-time status. Are you looking for a server with NO LAG? Are you looking for a server with an active wilderness? Are you looking for a server with guarenteed updates at least twice a week?
Then N0tpk is the right place for you, it all starts here!
Open Moderator places and Server Help and Adviser places so be active and u get spot :)
N0tpk Features:
• 24/7 Active Skilling, PvMing and PKing • Active forums will be soon back! • Updates every week guarenteed • Excellent, Friendly, and dedicated staff • Not overpower starter packages • Stable economy, no economy-resets • Amazing donator benefits •One extraodinary donator zone • All PvP items, chaotics , sol, spirit shields and much more! •Custom Yell tags •Working Teleblock Some Pictures: [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3218194/kalev1.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3218202/kalev_2.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3218205/kalev_3.png[/img] [img]http://www.upload.ee/image/3218210/kalev_4.png[/img]
ECO Client here: ECO Client here: [url=http://uppit.com/yl0mnwffkfz9/N0tpk_Client.rar]Download N0tpk.Client.rar @ UppIT[/url] Updates:
* Money ticket's 100m,500m,1b,2147m. * Added Help system ::help , ::helpcenter. * Added Chaos elemental, dropping chaotic's [wild 53+] * Added Steel Dragons, dropping spirit shield's [wild 55] * Item bonuses fixed. * Skeletal wyverns fixed. * Alching fixed. * Added ::rules. * Skilling - combat xp changed. * Awsome Skilling-zone. * Godwars fixed ::gwd1 , ::gwd2 , ::gwd3. * Armadyl and Saradomin godsword's spec bug fixed. * Removed overpower shops. * Added ::resettask. * Added ::resetcombat. * Fixed spellbook. * All monster drops fixed. * Added custom Donation items with special bonuses. * Fixed equipments holdings. * Made stall's working. * Fixed Clan-chat. * Added Dice. * Added new minigame ::fightarena. * Added crafting uncut's. * Fixed PvP points. * Added FunPK. * Re-done ::train area. * Added ::kdr - also fixed it in quest tab! * Updated ::commands. * Added ::maxhit. * Added rocktail fishing and all fishing spots to skilling area. * Added ::staff command. (online-staffmembers) * Fixed Major bug that people can't attack anymore in safe-zone.
